thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Ukraine energy ministry website hit by ransomware attack - spokeswoman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ukraine energy ministry website hit by ransomware attack - spokeswoman
text:
KIEV, The website of Ukraine’s energy and coal ministry website has been hit by a cyber attack, though the websites of state-run energy companies have not been affected, the ministry’s spokeswoman said by phone.
As of 0734 GMT, a message posted in English on the website was demanding a ransom paid in Bitcoin to recover encrypted files.
“Our specialists are working right now ... We do not know how long it will take to resolve the issue,” the spokeswpman said. “Ukrenergo, Energoatom - everything is okay with their sites, it’s only our site that does not work.” (Reporting by Natalia Zinets; writing by Matthias Williams; Editing by Kevin Liffey)
